description: Another yuki-onna who was part of Nurarihyon`s Hyakki Yakou 400 years ago. Her solution to things she didn`t like was to freeze them. She is Tsurara`s mother and had an unrequited love for Nurarihyon, which resulted in her greatly disliking his eventual wife, Youhime. At the final battle with Hagoromo-Gitsune, she had a death match with Ibaraki-douji.
name: Setsura
